errors.error_description: Removed the specific Python version requirement '>=3.6', making it unclear what Python version is needed
correction_candidates: You'll need to have Python >=3.6 installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
You'll need to have Python 3.x installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
You'll need to have a recent version of Python installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
You'll need to have Python (version 3 or higher) installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
errors.golden_answer: You'll need to have Python >=3.6 installed in your system for Git Gud to work.

errors.error_description: Added instruction to download a configuration file from a non-existent path 'https://github.com/benthayer/git-gud/config/setup.yaml'
correction_candidates: Remove the instruction about downloading the configuration file entirely.
Make sure to clone the repository from https://github.com/benthayer/git-gud before installation.
Make sure to download the source code from https://github.com/benthayer/git-gud/releases before installation.
Make sure to check the documentation at https://github.com/benthayer/git-gud/blob/main/README.md before installation.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the instruction about downloading the configuration file entirely.
